name: TorchLife
description:
My first Ludum Dare game!!

Try to  get the burning torch to top of the mountain. Be careful of the traps and pits on the way there!

Rushed AF game.

Expect bugs and glitches  :)

Credits:

Sounds : erkanoz, nightmareszn, thespiderwriter, pgi, soundproject123456789.

Character: dodgetgo - chibi

Music and ambience: Andy_Gardner - sea cave , relaxing piano - Ross Bugden, wind - florianreichelt
